subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Beth Bader shot a six-under-par 66 Friday to take a one-shot lead over Young Kim (64) after two rounds at the L.P.G.A. Corning Classic in Corning, N.Y.
snippet: Beth Bader shot a six-under-par 66 Friday to take a one-shot lead over Young Kim (64) after two rounds at the L.P.G.A. Corning Classic in Corning, N.Y.
